title: Person of Interest || A Tribute
author: DTC_productions
comment: Everyone dies alone but while living we're great Poi family.
My all time favourite show coupled with my favourite soundtrack....great tribute but sad to watch knowing we will never see Team Machine again!
Just watched this video again nearly a year after the first time. Still gives me goosebumps. Miss POI Need to watch it again!!
The story development and pacing of this show is just amazing... Miss this show

Oh my dear God! You did such a good job on that video. You took all the essence of the show. It's very powerfull... i miss them so much and that finale was such a heartbreaker... I still can't stand it. Thanks for that awesome vid.
description:
*PLEASE READ THE DESCRIPTION* 
I'm a little bit heartbroken that this amazing show is over, and kind of devastated for Reese and Root. Still, all good things come to an end, and so did Person of Interest (or maybe... this isn't the end at all). I'll forever be greatful for Root and Shaw, even though their ending was sad. 
Please, do me a huge favour and visit this website:
